name: Amaze ?ttraction Rapid Racing
text:
Target 1 "Amazement" monster you control or 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip this card to that target. You can activate this effect based on the equipped monster's controller. You can only use the preceding effect of "Amaze ?ttraction Cyclone Coaster" once per turn.
? You: Target 1 card in either GY; change the equipped monster's battle position, and if you do, shuffle that target into the Deck.

? Your opponent: Increase the equipped monster's Level by 1, and if you do, change its battle position.
